verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

Thou \w therefore|strong="H0859"\w*, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w a|strong="H5375"\w* \w lamentation|strong="H7015"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3220"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* dwelleth \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* entry \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, being \w the|strong="H0559"\w* mart \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w islands|strong="H0339"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*: \w O|strong="H3069"\w* \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w*, thou hast \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w perfect|strong="H3632"\w* \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3220"\w* situate \w in|strong="H1129"\w* \w the|strong="H1129"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w the|strong="H1129"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*. Thy neighbours, \w that|strong="H3820"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* thee, \w have|strong="H1129"\w* \w perfected|strong="H3634"\w* thy \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w*:

\w With|strong="H5921"\w* \w fir|strong="H1265"\w* \w trees|strong="H1265"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Sanir \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* thee \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* sea \w planks|strong="H3871"\w*: \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* Libanus \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* thee masts.

\w They|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H1323"\w* cut thy oars \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w oaks|strong="H0437"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* Basan: \w and|strong="H1323"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H1323"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* thee benches \w of|strong="H1323"\w* Indian \w ivory|strong="H8127"\w* \w and|strong="H1323"\w* cabins \w with|strong="H8127"\w* things \w brought|strong="H6213"\w* \w from|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w islands|strong="H0339"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* Italy.

\w Fine|strong="H8336"\w* broidered \w linen|strong="H8336"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* woven \w for|strong="H4714"\w* thy \w sail|strong="H5251"\w*, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* spread \w on|strong="H1961"\w* thy mast: \w blue|strong="H8504"\w* \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w purple|strong="H0713"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w islands|strong="H0339"\w* \w of|strong="H0339"\w* Elisa, \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* thy \w covering|strong="H4374"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1961"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Sidon|strong="H6721"\w*, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* Arabians \w were|strong="H1961"\w* thy rowers: thy \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w men|strong="H2450"\w*, O \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w*, \w were|strong="H1961"\w* thy \w pilots|strong="H2259"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H2205"\w* \w Gebal|strong="H1380"\w*, \w and|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w men|strong="H2450"\w* thereof furnished mariners \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* service \w of|strong="H2205"\w* thy various furniture: \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ships|strong="H0591"\w* \w of|strong="H2205"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w and|strong="H2388"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* mariners \w were|strong="H1961"\w* thy factors.

\w The|strong="H5414"\w* Persians, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* Lydians, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* Libyans \w were|strong="H1961"\w* thy \w soldiers|strong="H0376"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* thy \w army|strong="H2428"\w*: \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w hung|strong="H8518"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w buckler|strong="H4043"\w* \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w helmet|strong="H3553"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* thee \w for|strong="H2428"\w* thy ornament.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Arad \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w*: \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Pygmeans also \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w towers|strong="H4026"\w*, \w hung|strong="H8518"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w quivers|strong="H7982"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w*: \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w perfected|strong="H3634"\w* thy \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* Carthaginians thy \w merchants|strong="H5503"\w* \w supplied|strong="H5414"\w* thy fairs \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w kinds|strong="H1952"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w riches|strong="H1952"\w*, \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, \w tin|strong="H0913"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w lead|strong="H5777"\w*.

\w Greece|strong="H3120"\w*, Thubal, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* Mosoch, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* thy \w merchants|strong="H7402"\w*: \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w brought|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w people|strong="H0120"\w* \w slaves|strong="H0120"\w* \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*.

\w From|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Thogorma they \w brought|strong="H5414"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w mules|strong="H6505"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* thy market.

\w The|strong="H7725"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Dedan|strong="H1719"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w merchants|strong="H7402"\w*: \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w islands|strong="H0339"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* traffic \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w they|strong="H3027"\w* exchanged \w for|strong="H3027"\w* thy price \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w ivory|strong="H8127"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w ebony|strong="H1894"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w Syrian|strong="H0758"\w* \w was|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w merchant|strong="H5503"\w*: \w by|strong="H5414"\w* reason \w of|strong="H7230"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H7230"\w* thy \w works|strong="H4639"\w*, they \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w forth|strong="H5414"\w* precious \w stones|strong="H7553"\w*, \w and|strong="H0713"\w* \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, \w and|strong="H0713"\w* broidered \w works|strong="H4639"\w*, \w and|strong="H0713"\w* \w fine|strong="H0948"\w* \w linen|strong="H0948"\w*, \w and|strong="H0713"\w* silk, \w and|strong="H0713"\w* chodchod \w in|strong="H5414"\w* thy market.

Juda \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* thy \w merchants|strong="H7402"\w* \w with|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* best corn: \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w forth|strong="H5414"\w* \w balm|strong="H6875"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* rosin \w in|strong="H0776"\w* thy fairs.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w* \w were|strong="H5503"\w* thy \w merchants|strong="H5503"\w* \w in|strong="H4639"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w works|strong="H4639"\w*, \w in|strong="H4639"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* divers \w riches|strong="H1952"\w*, \w in|strong="H4639"\w* rich \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \w in|strong="H4639"\w* \w wool|strong="H6785"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* best colour.

Dan, \w and|strong="H1270"\w* \w Greece|strong="H3120"\w*, \w and|strong="H1270"\w* Mosel \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w forth|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* thy marts \w wrought|strong="H6219"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*: stacte, \w and|strong="H1270"\w* \w calamus|strong="H7070"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* thy market.
The men \w of|strong="H7402"\w* \w Dedan|strong="H1719"\w* \w were|strong="H1719"\w* thy \w merchants|strong="H7402"\w* in tapestry for seats.

\w Arabia|strong="H6152"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Cedar, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w merchants|strong="H5503"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: thy \w merchants|strong="H5503"\w* came \w to|strong="H3027"\w* thee \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3733"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* rants, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* kids.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* sellers \w of|strong="H7218"\w* Saba, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* Reema, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* thy \w merchants|strong="H7402"\w*: \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w best|strong="H7218"\w* \w spices|strong="H1314"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, which \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w forth|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* thy market.

\w Haran|strong="H2771"\w*, \w and|strong="H7614"\w* Chene, \w and|strong="H7614"\w* \w Eden|strong="H5729"\w* were thy \w merchants|strong="H7402"\w*; Saba, Assur, \w and|strong="H7614"\w* Chelmad sold to thee.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* thy \w merchants|strong="H7402"\w* in divers manners, with bales \w of|strong="H7402"\w* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w* \w cloth|strong="H7553"\w*, \w and|strong="H8504"\w* \w of|strong="H7402"\w* \w embroidered|strong="H7553"\w* \w work|strong="H7553"\w*, \w and|strong="H8504"\w* \w of|strong="H7402"\w* precious riches, which \w were|strong="H1992"\w* \w wrapped|strong="H2280"\w* \w up|strong="H2280"\w* \w and|strong="H8504"\w* \w bound|strong="H2280"\w* with \w cords|strong="H2256"\w*: \w they|strong="H1992"\w* had cedars also in thy \w merchandise|strong="H4819"\w*.

\w The|strong="H4390"\w* \w ships|strong="H0591"\w* \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w were|strong="H0591"\w* thy chief \w in|strong="H3220"\w* thy \w merchandise|strong="H4627"\w*: \w and|strong="H3220"\w* thou wast replenished, \w and|strong="H3220"\w* \w glorified|strong="H3513"\w* \w exceedingly|strong="H3966"\w* \w in|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

Thy rowers \w have|strong="H4325"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* thee \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*: \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w south|strong="H3220"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* hath \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* thee \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

Thy \w riches|strong="H1952"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* thy treasures, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* thy manifold furniture, thy mariners, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* thy \w pilots|strong="H2259"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* kept thy goods, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* chief \w over|strong="H5307"\w* thy \w people|strong="H0376"\w*: thy \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w also|strong="H3820"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* thee, \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy multitude \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* thee: \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* thy \w ruin|strong="H4658"\w*.

Thy fleets shall \w be|strong="H6963"\w* troubled \w at|strong="H2201"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* \w cry|strong="H2201"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* thy \w pilots|strong="H2259"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w handled|strong="H8610"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* oar \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w come|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w from|strong="H3381"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w ships|strong="H0591"\w*: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* mariners, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w pilots|strong="H2259"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w upon|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*:

\w And|strong="H7218"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H7218"\w* \w mourn|strong="H5921"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* loud \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w shall|strong="H7218"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* \w bitterly|strong="H4751"\w*: \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H7218"\w* \w cast|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w shall|strong="H7218"\w* \w be|strong="H6963"\w* sprinkled \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w ashes|strong="H0665"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8242"\w* \w they|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w shave|strong="H7139"\w* \w themselves|strong="H5315"\w* \w bald|strong="H7144"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H8242"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w girded|strong="H2296"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* haircloth: \w and|strong="H8242"\w* \w they|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w weep|strong="H1058"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* thee \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w bitterness|strong="H4751"\w* \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, \w with|strong="H0413"\w* most \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1058"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3220"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w a|strong="H5375"\w* mournful song \w for|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3220"\w* snail \w lament|strong="H7015"\w* thee: \w What|strong="H4310"\w* city \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w*, \w which|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w become|strong="H5375"\w* \w silent|strong="H1822"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*?

Which \w by|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w merchandise|strong="H4627"\w* \w that|strong="H0776"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* thee \w by|strong="H0776"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* didst \w fill|strong="H7646"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: which \w by|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* thy \w riches|strong="H1952"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* didst \w enrich|strong="H6238"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6256"\w* thou art destroyed \w by|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, thy riches are \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* bottom \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* multitude \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H4325"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* thee \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w islands|strong="H0339"\w* \w are|strong="H4428"\w* \w astonished|strong="H8074"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* thee: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* being struck \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* storm \w have|strong="H3605"\w* changed \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w*.
